name: Verify G Key Does Not Trigger Errors During Suit Interaction
description: Validates that pressing the G key while interacting with the suit does not cause errors or unexpected mode changes.
testObjective: Ensure the deprecated drone mode is not accessible during suit interaction and no errors occur.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player is standing near the suit embedded in the wall

steps.action: Approach the glowing suit embedded in the wall
steps.expected: Suit is visible and appears interactable

steps.action: Press [E] to begin interacting with the suit

steps.expected: No error message appears, player remains in normal view, no mode change occurs

steps.action: Verify player view and game state
steps.expected: Player is still in normal first-person view, not in drone view

postconditions: Player remains in normal view mode
